subject: Football (College)
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Geno Smith threw two first-half touchdown passes and Tavon Austin returned a kickoff for a score as No. 24 West Virginia beat Marshall, 34-13, on Sunday night in Morgantown.
snippet: Geno Smith threw two first-half touchdown passes and Tavon Austin returned a kickoff for a score as No. 24 West Virginia beat Marshall, 34-13, on Sunday night in Morgantown.
